modName: Link from The Legend of Zelda
summary: Play as Link from The Legend of Zelda series. Master Sword and Zelda relevant items included!
descriptionHtml:
I saw a terrible version of Link on here, as a Nord no less, so I decided to do it better.
Start the game in Riverwood, immediately following the intro dragon attack.  You\'ll start with some better than average weapons and several misc items to get you immersed in the role of Link!

Link is a High Elf.

Zelda relevant items include:
--------------------------------------------------
Link\'s Green Tunic!
(comes in several flavors: /w hood attached, without hood, hood unattached, ragged hat to show off the ears)
Sword (retextured to look like the Master Sword [not included])
Master Sword texture: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=605
Bow
Green, Blue and Red rupees! (emeralds, Sapphires, Garnets, Rubies)
Insects in Jars!
Epona\'s Carrot (regular carrot)
Ocarina! (regular flute)
Plus more!

EDIT: External Downloads to go along with Link.
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Glass Sword = Master Sword texture by shad0wn3t
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=605
Navi Mouse Cursor by Kenney
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=687
author: Sahasrahla
